attributes.action: There shall be an early general election.
attributes.additional_details: Following the Budget Statement it is clear that the Labour Government is no longer following the mandate by which it was elected by breaking the clear election promise that they wouldn’t raise taxes for normal working people. Instead they have lied to the British Tax payers by increasing taxes to allow for increased welfare spending for individuals that choose not to work and rather claim welfare benefits.
attributes.background: The government should call an early general election.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
